long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Squaredle is a word finding game hosted at squaredle.app. Players must search a 4x4 grid of letters, tracing a path between adjacent letters to form valid English words. The Squaredle Solver extension simply opens a new tab to a page that provides the puzzle solutions. Players who are stumped or impatient may just want to know what they're missing rather than stare at the unsolved puzzle, so this extension provides them a way out of the deadlock.
